name: Pirate Tough
flavor: A thickly muscled and tattooed pirate with melon-sized fists.

features.name: Swashbuckler - Passive
features.desc: When the Tough marks 2 or fewer HP from an attack within Melee range, the attacker must mark a Stress.

features.name: Clear the Decks - Action
features.desc: Make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, mark a Stress to move into Melee range of the target, dealing 3d4 physical damage and knocking the target back to Close range.
